trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다는 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>클래스</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> 의 이벤트</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> 에 대해 AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler 대리자 정의

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>라는 서브루틴을 지정 하 여 클래스 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 응용 프로그램의 Global.asax 파일에.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs an <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>생성는 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>현재 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>에 전달 된 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** 이벤트.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>개체에 제공 되는 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** 사용자 지정 값으로의 익명 식별자를 설정 하는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 값을 지정 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>중에 속성의 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** 이벤트는 <xref:System.Guid>사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A> by setting the configuration element to `true`.
trans-unit.target: **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** 이벤트는 익명 id는 경우에 발생 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>구성 요소를 설정 하 여 `true`.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>
